htwberlin.mau_mau.view_management.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • htwberlin.mau_mau.view_management.view.View

  • @Component
public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides actions for the player to interact with the game and handles game responds to the player.

      • showTable

        public void showTable(Deck hand,
                      Card openCard,
                      java.util.List<Player> players)
        Shows game table to the real player, incl. cards in the real player's hand, number of the cards per each virtual player and the open card in the playing stack.
        Parameters:
        hand - Deck object representing cards in the real player's hand
        openCard - the open card on the top of the playing stack
        players - the players

      • requestPlayerMove

        public int requestPlayerMove(int min,
                             int max,
                             boolean isEightPlayed)
        Request player move, returns card position in player's hand or code for other operations - draw card, say mau, etc.
        Parameters:
        min - first card number in player's hand
        max - last card number in player's hand
        isEightPlayed - true if 'eight' rule is enabled
        Returns:
        int card position in player's hand or code for other operations
